name: Idle Tower Defense
description:
Idle Tower Defense is the perfect blend of two popular genres - idle games and tower defense games, of course!

Build up to 20 unique towers, each having their own specialty attack type and skills. Use them to fend off the constant onslaught of enemy monsters. Upgrade your towers to match the progressively more difficult monsters and bosses!

There is no repetitive tapping in this game! The "active play" aspect of this game involves clicking on a monster that almost sneaks by to focus target it with your towers, and using your towers' powerful skills to get that extra power needed for difficult waves.

Features:
- NO TAPPING! The active play aspect of this game involves targeting enemies and using your towers' skills.
- 20 unique towers.
- Various tower types such as Frost, Poison, Multi-Shot, Splash, Chaos, etc.
- Each tower has 2 unique and powerful skills.
- Specifically target an enemy by tapping it as it runs through the maze.
- 15 enemies per wave. Boss at the end of each wave.
- Play 5 different mazes. It switches after each Prestige.
- "Farm Wave" option for efficient idle gold farming.
- Collect Equipment for towers by getting a certain number of kills with the tower.
- Collect powerful Aura bonuses every 15 waves.
- Purchase useful Blueprints with diamonds earned via Prestige.
- Offline gold, daily play bonus, and several achievements.
- Weather visual effects and fun 3d graphics.
- And so much more!
